title: Ultimate Paintball Challenge (Ultimate Paintbrawl 3)
description:
Ultimate Paintball Challenge (Ultimate Paintbrawl 3)
============================================================
INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS:
	- Mount UltimatePaintballChallenge.cue (It's important to keep in mind it's the .CUE you need) and install using setup.exe from the disk.
	- Restart your computer after installation is complete. Afterwards, mount UltimatePaintballChallenge.cue again in order to play.
	- That's it, enjoy this release!
============================================================
System Requirements:
	Pentium 200MHz
	32MB RAM
	32-bit drivers for CD-ROM, video and sound cards and input devices
	DirectX 7.0a for Windows (included)
	100% DirectX 7.0a-compatible video card with 2MB RAM
	180MB of uncompressed hard drive space plus 50MB for Windows swap file
	4X CD-ROM drive
	100% Windows 95/98-compatible true 16-bit sound card
	100% Windows 95/98-compatible keyboard and mouse with drivers
============================================================
Charge through the brush watching over your shoulder. Feel the air pumping through your lungs and the adrenaline rushing through your veins. You are the Captain of your paintball team. Handpick your team members outfit them with authentic safety gear and paintball markers and execute the strategies that will lead you to victory. Choose from 10 different large-scale maps. Get in your gear. Get the enemy in your sights. Get in the action.
============================================================
released by neohacker21
